channel.title: #174: Corey Haines, founder of the Swipe Files community
channel.description:
My guest in this episode is Corey Haines, founder of [Swipe Files](https://www.swipefiles.com/). Swipe Files is a membership site that provides content, community, and courses to help you master marketing.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/688a6def-e580-43aa-8fca-f4b056a4de2c?dark=false"></iframe>
* [Learn more about Swipe Files](https://www.swipefiles.com/membership). * Corey's podcast: [Everything is Marketing](https://www.swipefiles.com/everything-is-marketing).
[This episode is also on YouTube](https://youtu.be/LWIb3YtjrV4).
